comments.html:
Way to go Ivan, those questions were from me, and anyone who reads this should be in NO doubt. This stuff is top notch and well worth the investment. I am almost 10 years a CCIE and 30 in IT / Networking and I am still learning.

Do these webinars help ?

Answer : Yes 110%

Steve
